Title: Youjiang First Congress of Workers, Peasants and Soldiers
Publisher: Guangxi renmin chubanshe (广西人民出版社)
Notes: On December 11, 1929, Deng Xiaoping, Zhang Yunyi (张云逸) and others started the Baise Uprising (百色起义, Baise Qiyi) in Guangxi Province against the Guomindang government and founded the Seventh Army of the Chinese Workers' and Peasants' Red Army. On the same day, the First Congress of Workers, Peasants and Soldiers of Youjiang Counties was held in Jingzheng College, Pingma Town, Tiandong County. The image shows Deng speaking.
